newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to sell $23 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Jan 13.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to sell $23 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Jan 13.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Tuesday it will auction $23 billion of three- and six-month bills on Jan 13 to pay down $4.575 billion as $27.568 billion of bills are maturing.
The weekly bill sale will be equally divided between the two maturities. The bills will be issued on Jan 16. The three-month bills mature on April 17 and the six-month bills mature on July 17.
The CUSIP number for the three-month bills is 9127944F8 and for the six-month bills is 9127945E0.
